titleStmt.title: Fifteen questions touching church government, clandestinately purposed to, but publickly answered by Rob. Howson M.A. and minister of the town and county of Poole
titleStmt.author: Howson, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Copy filmed at UMI microfilm Early English Books 1641-1700 reel 2501 has pages cropped with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Christ Church Library, Oxford.
